description:
Sakura`s testimony has bought Class D time, but Horikita and Ayanokoji still need to find a way to tilt things in their favor. Meanwhile, Sakura senses the presence of a strange man nearby.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Il y a deux sortes de mensonges, celui de fait qui regarde le passé, celui de droit qui regarde l`avenir.
There Are Two Kinds of Lies; One Concerns an Accomplished Fact, the Other Concerns a Future Duty.
Uso ni wa Ni Shurui Aru. Kako ni Kansuru Jijitsujou no Uso to Mirai ni Kansuru Kenrijou no Uso de Aru.
هناك صنفان للأكاذيب: الأول يتعلق بحقيقة مُنجزة، والآخر بواجب مستقبلي
嘘には二種類ある. 過去に関する事実上の嘘と未来に関する権利上の嘘である.
거짓말에는 두 가지 종류가 있다, 과거 사실에 대한 거짓말과 미래에 관련된 거짓말이다
